title: Improving Our Nation Through Better Design
summary: The document is an executive order titled 'Improving Our Nation Through Better Design,' issued on August 21, 2025. It establishes 'America by Design,' a national initiative aimed at enhancing the usability and aesthetics of federal services, both digital and physical. Key components include the creation of a National Design Studio and the appointment of a Chief Design Officer to coordinate efforts across government agencies. The order mandates that agencies improve their services by July 4, 2026, and comply with the 21st Century Integrated Digital Experience Act. The initiative seeks to reduce costs, enhance public trust, and improve the quality of experiences for Americans. The order also outlines the recruitment of top design talent from the private sector and other sources. The National Design Studio will advise agencies on standardized design practices and cost reduction strategies.
